quote: "When you stand before God, you cannot say, 'But I was told by others to do thus,' or that virtue was not convenient at the time. This will not suffice."
"...a house divided against itself shall not stand."
" 'You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.' - Wayne Gretzky"
"Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, 'Would an idiot do that?' And if they would, I do not do that thing."
"Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you."
"Time is the capital of your life, so spend it wisely."
"...but are you a different animal and the same beast?"
"I won't be a rock star. I will be a legend."
"Note to self: no matter how bad life gets, there's always beer."
"It's foolish to fear what we have yet to see and know."
"You cannot live your life in fear, or you will forsake the best parts of it."
"Freedom is the right of all sentient beings."
